ing: 4 (12 fluid ounce) cans or bottles light beer
2 (12 ounce) cans frozen lemonade concentrate (such as Minute MaidÂ®)
des: "Enjoy this refreshing drink at a party!"
ins: Pour beer into a large pitcher. Add frozen lemonade; stir to combine. Use lemonade can to measure out vodka; pour into pitcher and stir to combine.
